description: This file defines a React functional component called TodoList, which renders a list of todo items or a message when the list is empty. It imports React and a child component TodoItem and uses props to handle the list of todos and related actions.

methods.name: TodoList({ todos, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a list of todo items or an empty state message.

ctags.name: TodoList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TodoList({ todos, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate }) {$/
